thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 13 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Trematon Capital Investments Sees HY HEPS Down 150 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trematon Capital Investments Sees HY HEPS Down 150 Pct
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Trematon Capital Investments Ltd :
* HEPS FOR SIX MONTHS TO FEB 28 WILL DECREASE BY APPROXIMATELY 150% FROM PREVIOUS COMPARABLE INTERIM PERIOD
* HY INTRINSIC NET ASSET VALUE EXPECTED TO RISE BY ABOUT 24% TO 446 CENTS PER SHARE FROM 361 CENTS PER SHARE
* DECREASE IN HEADLINE EARNINGS IS MAINLY DUE TO EXPENSES RELATED TO TAKE-ON AND REFURBISHMENT OF PROPERTIES
* HY BOOK NET ASSET VALUE IS EXPECTED TO RISE BY ABOUT 30% TO 389 CENTS PER SHARE FROM 299 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
